abilities.name: Malevolent Shrine
abilities.description: While activated any enemy starting their turn on the user's side will take 25% of their maximum health as damage. User also gains 25% buff to basic attack.

abilities.name: Tusk ACT4
abilities.description: Johnny's Stand, Tusk ACT4, materializes to deliver a devastating blow, bypassing all defenses. Also, Johnny's evasion rate increases for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Limitless
abilities.description: Gojo's unique Limitless Cursed Technique enhances his evasive abilities while he's on his side.
